name: L'instant T Companion App
description:
This is our companion application for the board game L'instant T.

I've coded and made all the graphics for this application.

For the board game itself, I worked with the team below:
Capucine Nicolas- Lead Game Designer
David Garcia - Graphics for the playing cards and for the construction card.
Camila Suarez - Game Designer
Manon Cabal - Game Design
